## ErrorX.processStack() method

Public wrapper for processing error stack traces with delimiter. Delegates to the private processErrorStack method for implementation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static processStack(error: Error, delimiter: string): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

error


</td><td>

Error


</td><td>

Error whose stack to process


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

delimiter


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

String to search for in stack lines


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

Processed stack trace starting after the delimiter

## Example


```typescript
const error = new Error('Something failed')
const cleanStack = ErrorX.processStack(error, 'my-app-entry')
// Returns stack trace starting after the line containing 'my-app-entry'
```
